comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

Tbh, tons of well deserved hate for the two 'D's, but what about the other half? Something to be said about how all Rs just gets a by in this whole debacle like it's a lost cause with them in the first place
The up sides of paid leave are manifold. From a European view, not considering it is mindboggling.
They’re already left behind. This would merely maintain the status quo.

Richie Neal’s paid family leave as written is a recipe for disaster. Not to mention a giveaway to private insurers instead of being run through the social security office. 

It would be akin to current broken unemployment systems where 50% of folks eligible elect not to receive benefits because navigating the system is extremely cumbersome and time intensive.

Of all the provisions left out of BBB, Neal’s paid family leave is not the hill to die on. The hill to die on is robust prescription drug reform.
Because women and families of color do not count when corporations are in the mix.

We will keep fighting for every piece cut to appease Manchin. The good news is we are not being demonized but am entitled sadist monster who plays non stop golf and has ‘office time’ all day while employing thugs, toilet designers, landscapers etc to run our critical agencies.

Why does it have to be of color ? It leaves people financially behind . As a society we need to stop adding  "white , color " .
This creates a divide and makes it us vrs them , specifically for those being at the brink of being racist.  They see this and start thinking what about me.( a non color ) but of course they are included but they don't see it that way. If we want to advance for " color" people ,stop fucking calling them color and just say American.

>Paid family leave is one of the most glaring cuts in Biden's slimmed-down economic agenda

After the climate.

Without that, the rest hardly matters.

Of course it does. All because Manchin is protecting his bottom line and Enema is on the take.

Also the GQP and their voters are degenerates who are not salvageable.
Don’t worry though, they’ll dangle that carrot again in a few years and people will still eat it up.
